reason: The function '_0x0000006e2b22_lets_not_compete__821' uses inline assembly to execute 'suicide(origin)', which forces the contract to send all its Ether balance to the address of the transaction's origin. This is highly dangerous as any external caller can trigger this function, causing the contract to self-destruct and send all its funds to the transaction origin, which might not be the transaction sender if called through another contract. This can lead to unexpected behavior and loss of funds.
